summary: This is an email chain from December 2020 discussing a follow-up regarding an individual named Mouradian. The chain includes a forwarded message from Bennett Epstein providing Mouradian's contact number. The document appears to be internal government correspondence, likely from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

persons.name: Bennett Epstein
persons.context: Sent the original email on December 28, 2020, providing Mouradian's contact number to a USANYS recipient.

persons.name: Mouradian
persons.context: An individual whose contact number is being shared via email among USANYS personnel and contractors.

connections.description: Bennett Epstein possesses and shares Mouradian's contact number, indicating some form of acquaintance or connection.

events.title: Bennett Epstein provides Mouradian's number
events.description: Bennett Epstein sends an email to a USANYS address containing Mouradian's contact number.

events.title: Internal follow-up on Mouradian
events.description: An internal email chain among USANYS personnel and contractors discusses following up on the matter concerning Mouradian.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated December 28-30, 2020, involving the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
Bennett Epstein is the sender of the original message providing contact information for an individual named Mouradian.
The subject of the correspondence is 'Mouradian', and the content involves sharing and following up on this individual's contact details.
The document identifier EFTA00086949 is associated with this email, and a related document EFTA00086950 is referenced.
Multiple USANYS personnel and contractors are involved in the email chain, but their names are redacted or represented by placeholders.
